Text:
Please can you upload this German Movie 
Das Versprechen (1995)
IMDB link:http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111613/

A terrific treatment of the 14th amendment history and its impact as a new breath to the concept of equal protection in the constitutional body of the U.S. 
Here is another interesting educational constitutional series: 
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6274828/The_Constitution_-_That_Delicate_Balance

Thanks to Ram for another great contribution.
